name: Google Dark Blue Project
description:
To be clear - this is a work in progress. I doubt I'll be able to put all of Google's sub domains into one style.

Originally I just wanted google search to be darker so I could browse man7.org and search without being blinded during a search. It morphed into almost a complete theme for most of google (except Gmail - separate monster).

NOTE: This theme is a big work in progress. Google Search and News is basically done, the rest will take a while. Also, in order to keep styles within the google domain from conflicting i had to resort to mostly regex matches. Please let me know if you run across some crazy glitches, or simple incomplete pages.

user.name: TheArkive
user.about:
I just theme stuff as I get to it, or as it annoys me...

The more it annoys me, the higher on the priority it gets to be themed!

I'll take requests, but I can't promise deadlines.

=======================

My style is always dark and easier on the eyes (been on a Dark Blue kick lately).  I prefer to have rows highlight on hover on almost every table.  I like buttons to do the same.

additional_info:
2016/01/03
- fixed google image search
2016/01/01
- added some more pages (like settings pages, support, etc)
